email_chain.subject: Freight Offer for 15,000MT of Coal from Richards Bay to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear Emily,

I hope this message finds you well. I am reaching out to present a freight offer for the shipment of 15,000MT of coal from Richards Bay to Rotterdam on CIF terms. The vessel we propose is the MV OCEAN HORIZON, with a DWT of 75,000 and LOA of 225m. The laycan is set for 20th to 25th October, and the initial freight quote is USD45 per MT.

Please let me know if this works for you or if you need any further details.

Best regards,
Lucas Martin
Maritime Brokers Ltd.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for 15,000MT of Coal from Richards Bay to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Hi Lucas,

Thank you for the offer. Given the current market conditions, I was hoping for a more competitive rate. Could you consider lowering the freight to USD42 per MT?

Also, could you confirm the demurrage rate per day and the loading window?

Looking forward to your reply.

Best,
Emily Carter
Global Charterers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for 15,000MT of Coal from Richards Bay to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear Emily,

Thank you for your response. Considering our long-term relationship, I can offer a revised freight rate of USD43 per MT. The demurrage rate is set at USD10,000 per day, and the loading window is 48 hours.

Please note that the laycan remains 20th to 25th October. I trust this revised offer meets your expectations.

Best regards,
Lucas Martin
Maritime Brokers Ltd.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for 15,000MT of Coal from Richards Bay to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Hi Lucas,

Thank you for the revised offer. We can agree to the USD43 per MT, provided the laycan is strictly adhered to. Could you confirm the stem details and any potential delays?

Best,
Emily Carter
Global Charterers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for 15,000MT of Coal from Richards Bay to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear Emily,

I confirm that the laycan will be strictly adhered to, and the stem details are as follows: loading at Richards Bay on 20th October, with a 48-hour loading window. There are no anticipated delays at this stage.

Please let me know if you need any further clarifications.

Best regards,
Lucas Martin
Maritime Brokers Ltd.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for 15,000MT of Coal from Richards Bay to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Hi Lucas,

Thank you for the confirmation. We agree to the terms and will proceed with the booking. Please send over the contract for review.

Best,
Emily Carter
Global Charterers
